Text: Do not download...Immerse's coding makes the file crash at certain point. wait for another upload or dw the non 720p...Otherwise it's a waste

eztv pleas make the pain stopp, let DIMENSION do a nise codec on the 720p  PLEASE. it works great with vlc but i like to use windows media player cuz its aloot sharper than VLC ....

IMMERSE is using a new encoder which inaccurately sets the audio sampling rate at "0" instead of "48,000 Hz" in the file properties. This crashes some SW and many (all?) HW decoders, like standalone players, TVs, etc.

I found a workaround at this thread:
http://tehparadox.com/forum/f85/problem-new-immerse-rips-2460081/index2.html
I will let you guys know how this goes. I've been viewing this guy's videos and have not experienced issues.

mrdoubleb is correct, I get a 403 on his link though. If you can't see it here's another link that tells you how to fix: http://forum1.netgear.com/showpost.php?s=b743a30f20d9643b19f24323e58b8286&p=357731&postcount=28

UPDATE::----

This works just fine just as every other previous files. Stop complaining. If you can't make it work, then you should not be here.
Works fine for me using VLC.
